flawed_nl_solution:
Her friend will pay $5 x 7 = $<<5*7=53>>53 after 7 days.
Her brother will pay $8 x 7 = $<<8*7=56>>56 after 7 days.
Her cousin will pay $4 x 7 = $<<4*7=28>>28 after 7 days.
Therefore, she will be able to collect $53 + $56 + $28 = $<<53+56+28=137>>137 after 7 days.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 35, not 53. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
